data.name: Winter Resort Simulator Season 2 - Content Pack
data.detailed_description:
Expand your even more with this ! Additional vehicles, snowcats and ropeways complete your gaming experience in Season 2! Prepare your slopes with the originally licensed Leitwolf, climb mountain trails with one of the new ATVs and complete exciting missions!


Explore a new and expanded ski region! Different tasks like preparing slopes, handling ropeways and managing the daily resort life are waiting for you and your friends. The new gameplay missions will challenge you every day. Grab your friends and prepare your slopes in the multiplayer mode! The Season 2 adds all that and even more to the game.

5 new vehicles
2 new ropeways
New game world with redesigned village
Challenging In-game missions


Prepare your slopes with the authentically recreated ! Depending on your needs, the Leitwolf is available both in a solo and a winch version, which allows you to reach the top even on the steepest slopes. You need more speed for an urgent delivery? Choose one of the three other new vehicles and get the job done! The ATV guarantees maximum acceleration and speed, while a crawler-type vehicle with articulated steering keeps you moving even in the most difficult terrain. Back on the street, a new SUV transports you and your friends safely back home.

Brand new snowcat Leitwolf in winch and solo version
New ATV in wheeled and crawler version
SUV Car for transport purposes
Off-road crawler vehicle with articulated steering
Officially licensed by


In addition to the vehicles, the content pack also brings two more ropeways to your game: Both a new D-Line type 10-seater gondola lift and a Funitel type ropeway are waiting to be put into operation. For the first time in , both ropeways are also equipped with a new ropeway control system that brings along new challenges. If you wish, you can also include both ropeways with their new station buildings in your very own map, which will even work in multiplayer! All ropeways are recreated with the kind permission of .

New D-Line 10-seater gondola lift
Authentic Funitel Type Ropeway with high transport capacity
Including a Funitel transport gondola for delivery purposes
Use the ropeways on your very own map!
Interactive tutorials for each ropeway


The renewed version of  village lies underneath the snowy mountains and waits to be explored by you and your friends! Redefined slopes winding through mountains need to be prepared for your guests. Visit the new alpine huts and enjoy the view of the panoramic mountain view of  Season 2! Explore the whole world during missions, delivering goods from the foot of the mountain to the top!

Extensively redesigned map with completely reworked village
New alpine restaurants and huts
8 different ropeways
16 ski slopes, almost doubled in area
More detailed environment and natural feeling
Challenging missions let you explore the new world

data.short_description: With the Season 2 - Content Pack of the Winter Resort Simulator, the winter wonderland is now even more extensive and offers more fun and variety with the many new vehicles and cable cars!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 / 8 / 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core with 3,0 GHz and Hyper Threading
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB VRAM | Shader Model 5.1
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core with 3,5 GHz recommended
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
